channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiSwitchManager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiSwitchManager

item.title: CVE-2022-42474|2024-10-22T20:46:07.625Z -- fortinet -- fortiswitchmanager
item.description: A relative path traversal vulnerability [CWE-23] in Fortinet FortiOS version 7.2.0 through 7.2.3, version 7.0.0 through 7.0.9 and before 6.4.12, FortiProxy version 7.2.0 through 7.2.1 and 7.0.0 through 7.0.7, FortiSwitchManager version 7.2.0 through 7.2.1 and before 7.0.1 allows an privileged attacker to delete arbitrary directories from the filesystem through crafted HTTP requests.
